existing_features.title: Update the existing Rewards section UI to display the provided Cash App donation message content in the section body.
Rename the existing "Rewards" section to "Donations" across the UI, including the section header and the TopNav navigation link, and ensure the TopNav link scrolls to the renamed section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the Rewards section content with Cash App donation text and rename the section to “Donations”.

projectName: Rename Rewards section to Donations and show Cash App donation text
